Pro sidebar is also available as a react package

Pro Sidebar

Responsive layout with advanced sidebar menu built with SCSS and vanilla Javascript
Full Code and documentation available on Github

Features

  • Fully responsive
  • Collapsable sidebar
  • Multi level menu
  • RTL support
  • Customizable

Resources

  • Css Pro Layout
  • Popper Core
  • Remix Icons
